accomplishment_projects.title: Track Developer and Facilitator: Nonprofit Technology Conference Tech Track
accomplishment_projects.description: The "Tech track" was created in order to "put the tech back" in the Nonprofit Technology Conference in 2010, a year when multimedia sessions outnumbered the technology sessions by about four to one. I developed and pitched the track, and participated as a co-facilitator on all five sessions. All sessions were done unconference style (no Powerpoint; attendees define the agenda) on topics including cloud computing, wireless/mobile, virtualization, budgeting, and change management. Feedback was positive: we scored 4.4 (out of 5.0) in the session evaluations, with no session under a 4 review.
